name: The OX
description: Rare Dankness created their own version of Bubba Kush by crossing it with their Stone Mountain, a Bubba Kush andÂ Blue Moonshine hybrid. The OX has a delightful flavor of coffee and berries, and a high CBD content, making it a good choice for medical users. Many indica hybrids have been created using The OX, including Chem OX, Blue OX, and Harlox.
